00037     // Helpers :

00077 
00086     static inline vertex_descriptor null_vertex() {
00087       return graph_type::null_reactor();
00088     }

00105     // Adjacency Graph Concept

00162   inline std::pair< TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator, 
00163                   TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator >
00164   out_edges(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00165            TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00166     return std::make_pair(r->ext_begin(), r->ext_end());
00167   }
00168   
00185   inline TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id
00186   source(TREX::transaction::graph::relation_type const &rel,
00187         TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00188     return &(rel.client());
00189   }
00190 
00210   inline TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id
00211   target(TREX::transaction::graph::relation_type const &rel,
00212         TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00213     if( rel.active() )
00214       return &(rel.server());
00215     return TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor();
00216   }
00217 
00234   inline TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::size_type 
00235   out_degree(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00236             TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00237     return TREX::transaction::graph::null_reactor()==r?0:r->count_externals();
00238   }

00258   inline std::pair< graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator,
00259                   graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator >
00260   adjacent_vertices(TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_id r,
00261                   TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00262     std::pair< TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator, 
00263               TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::external_iterator >
00264       tmp = out_edges(r, g);
00265     return std::make_pair
00266       (graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator(tmp.first, &g),
00267        graph_traits<TREX::transaction::graph>::adjacency_iterator(tmp.second, &g));
00268   }

00288   vertices(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {

00306   inline TREX::transaction::graph::size_type
00307   num_vertices(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {
00308     return g.count_reactors();

00316   edges(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {

00320   inline TREX::transaction::graph::size_type
00321   num_edges(TREX::transaction::graph const &g) {

00345       struct graph_edge_name_map 
00346        :public boost::put_get_helper<TREX::utils::Symbol, 
00347                                   graph_edge_name_map> {
00348 
00349        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00350        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol              value_type;
00351        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol const &      reference;
00352        typedef graph::relation_type             key_type;
00353 
00362        reference operator[](key_type const &rel) const {
00363          return rel.name();
00364        }

00380       struct graph_vertex_name_map 
00381        :public boost::put_get_helper<TREX::utils::Symbol, 
00382                                   graph_vertex_name_map> {
00383 
00384        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00385        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol              value_type;
00386        typedef TREX::utils::Symbol const &      reference;
00387        typedef graph::reactor_id                key_type;
00388 
00399        reference operator[](key_type r) const {
00400          static TREX::utils::Symbol const null_name;
00401 
00402          if( graph::null_reactor()==r )
00403            return null_name;
00404          else
00405            return r->getName();
00406        }
00407       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_vertex_name_map
00408       
00422       struct graph_vertex_id_map
00423        :public boost::put_get_helper<long, 
00424                                   graph_vertex_id_map> {
00425       public:
00426        typedef boost::readable_property_map_tag category;
00427        typedef long                             value_type;
00428        typedef long                             reference;
00429        typedef graph::reactor_id                key_type;
00430 
00437        graph_vertex_id_map(graph const &g)
00438          :m_g(&g) {}
00439        
00448        value_type operator[](key_type r) const {
00449          return m_g->index(r);
00450        }
00451       private:
00452        graph const *m_g;
00453 
00454       }; // TREX::transaction::details::graph_vertex_id_map

00457     
00467     class graph_names_writer {
00468     public:
00470       graph_names_writer() {}
00471       
00480       void operator()(std::ostream &out, graph::reactor_id r) const {
00481        if( graph::null_reactor()!=r )
00482          label(out, r->getName()); 
00483       }
00492       void operator()(std::ostream &out, graph::relation_type const &rel) const {
00493        if( rel->active() ) {
00494          out<<"[label=\""<<rel->name();
00495          if( rel->accept_goals() )
00496            out<<'['<<rel->latency()<<':'<<rel->look_ahead()<<"]\" color=\"blue";
00497          out<<"\"]";
00498        } else 
00499          // display inactive relation in red
00500          out<<"[label=\""<<rel->name()<<"\" color=\"red\"]";
00501       }
00502 
00503     private:
00512       void label(std::ostream &out, TREX::utils::Symbol const &name) const {
00513        out<<"[label=\""<<name<<"\"]";
00514       }       
00515     };
00516 
00517   } // TREX::transaction
